MESS
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which MESS installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using MESS, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load MESS/0.1.6-foss-2019b
```
